attributes.review: I downloaded this app and shortly after donald came out and punched my grandma in the face and then licked my toes and asked if he could eat my toenail clippings. Worst experience ever. Please go vote.
attributes.title: This app is cursed

attributes.review: Trump is a hot cheeto lol dusty crusty musty orange get out of here tanning goggles chose 😩😩
attributes.title: please read ❤️

attributes.review: I advise everyone to leave a terrible rating on this app this app needs to be taking off the App Store the reason why you should leave a one star review on this app is because Trump Is a Glizzy gladiator and all of his supporters are Glizzy gobblers so please for the sake of humanity leave a one star review
attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP

attributes.review: I was hoping to download a helpful app since Trump is my number one orange man, but unfortunately the app took a week to download and once I did the process to sign in process took even longer. Once I was able to sign in, my phone imminently started glitching and my most important apps started getting deleted. I soon realized  my bank accounts and social media accounts had been hacked by the bourgeoisie. I was very afraid because soon after I started receiving texts from unknown numbers saying they would kill me and my family if I continued using the app. I had no choice but to delete it. I would not recommend this app 😔
attributes.title: IT HACKED ALL OF MY INFORMATION

attributes.review: I downloaded this app at 3am after a long day thinking it was tinder and I was going to find some Mans but instead I saw a life size Orange named trump and when I tried to swipe left it didn’t let me and I had no choice but to swipe right😭 now I get creepy notifications for someone named Donald trump like pls stop harassing me!!!!! But ya don’t download I don’t know what to do now save me from the nightmare this app gave me !
attributes.title: Never downloaded!!!!!!

attributes.review: Yea this app gave me a virus??? Don’t download it at all, I definitely don’t recommend it to anyone else. I’d rather listen to 6ix9ine then to download this app again
attributes.title: Don’t do it hœ

attributes.review: zero stars. the app took half of my storage and twenty days to download and once i opened the app i had to answer these personal questions like “do i put my socks on both feet then my shoes or one sock one shoe one sock one shoe?” when i finished the survey it took me to the home screen and took half an hour to it. there was a link to reserve tickets to this orange looking dudes rally and i put them in but i was rejected because my hands weren’t big enough. i don’t know why this would happen my hands are a normal size. so after that i went to the app again and decided to read this guy’s campaign statement and it was full of lies. surely someone made this app for him and made the statements for him because no way could someone running for president be so dumb. after that disappointment i decided at last to read some articles and let me tell you they all came from a news source called fox news. and  we all know that you can never trust a fox. in conclusion this app was a disgrace to the app store and no one should download it.
Tbh I think I would rather lick a wet gym sock then actually use this app. You ain’t getting rid of tik tok that easily!💕💕✨😙✌️
